verbs.description: PHILADELPHIA ( AP ) — [ARG0: A federal judge] [V: ruled] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that the Trump administration can not cut off grants to Philadelphia over the way the city deals with immigrants in the country]
PHILADELPHIA ( AP ) — A federal judge ruled Wednesday that the Trump administration [V: can] not cut off grants to Philadelphia over the way the city deals with immigrants in the country

PHILADELPHIA ( AP ) — A federal judge ruled Wednesday that [ARG0: the Trump administration] [ARGM-MOD: can] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: cut] off [ARG1: grants to Philadelphia] [ARGM-CAU: over the way the city deals with immigrants in the country]

PHILADELPHIA ( AP ) — A federal judge ruled Wednesday that the Trump administration can not cut off grants to Philadelphia over [ARGM-MNR: the way] [ARG0: the city] [V: deals] [ARG1: with immigrants in the country]
